text: a l laoh ban banhcheak tha pitabrakd nasa kmean mcheasa na del trauv ke korp sakkar da pitabrakd krawpi trong del chhr leu pheap you tde thmr noh laey . haey banda mea la ai kat ning banda anakmean chamnehdoeng ka dauchnaoh der . kmean mcheasa na del trauv ke korp sakkar da pitabrakd krawpi trong del mha khlangpouke mha ktebandet laey
